comment: Thats the plan!!! Im starting to see a light at the end of this LONG tunnel. Just hoping more people will do the same.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG1 (t / that))
      :snt2 (s / start-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (l / light
                        :ARG0-of (e / end-01

                                    :mod (t3 / this))))))
      :snt3 (h / hope-01

            :ARG1 (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :quant (m2 / more))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / same-01))
            :mod (j / just)))
